name: Text Injection
description: Detects text/content injection vulnerabilities where user input is reflected in the response without proper validation or encoding, potentially allowing manipulation of displayed content
author: Dominator Team
cwe_name: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements in Output Used by a Downstream Component ('Injection')
remediation: Implement proper input validation and output encoding. Use context-aware encoding when displaying user input. Apply Content Security Policy headers. Validate and sanitize all user inputs before reflection.
